keyword: how many calories in 6 oz of chicken breast
title: How Many Calories in 6 oz Chicken Breast?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in 6 oz of chicken breast, plus detailed nutrition like protein, fat, carbs, and easy tweaks for your meals.
h1: How Many Calories in 6 oz Chicken Breast?
assumptions: Skinless, boneless chicken breast, cooked (roasted or grilled), no sauce/oil added; 6 oz â‰ˆ 170 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, cut, cooking method, seasoning, water content, and measurement; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 6 oz cooked, skinless chicken breast provides ~281 kcal and ~53 g protein.

label_note: Totals are scaled from the per-100 g basis and mirror Nutrition Facts fields.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil per 100 g
Breaded and fried (vs. grilled) per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 6 oz of cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: Approximately 281 kcal for skinless, boneless, grilled or roasted.

faqs.q: How much protein in 6 oz chicken breast?
Are these values for raw or cooked chicken breast?
faqs.a: Cooked weight; raw would be higher due to water loss during cooking.

faqs.q: Does adding marinade affect calories in chicken breast?
faqs.a: Yes, sugary or oil-based marinades can add 20-50 kcal per 100 g.

faqs.q: What is the fat content in 6 oz chicken breast?
faqs.a: Around 6.1 g total fat, mostly unsaturated, for skinless cooked.
